thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 7 of 65
thread.title: Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text: I cannot come up with enough "positive" words to describe my experience with Shane! I mostly appreciate his promptness, attentiveness, PATIENCE, kindness, and friendly personality. It took me over a week to make a final decision and Shane was with me ALL the way! His knowledge and expertise in handling my future vacation was exceptional! I sooo very much appreciate him and will not hesitate to seek him out again when the time comes! Well Done my friend and thank you from the heart!
